errors.group_only: This command only works in groups.
errors.private_only: This command only works in private chats.

errors.bot_admin_required: I need to be an admin to use this command.
errors.owner_only: This command is only for the owner.
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

errors.not_in_group: User is not in this group.

antilink.enabled: Anti-link is now *enabled* for this group.
antilink.disabled: Anti-link is now *disabled* for this group.
antilink.warn_message: @{user}, links are not allowed in this group.

antidelete.enabled:
Anti-Delete is now *enabled*.

Deleted messages will be revealed!
antidelete.what_it_does: When enabled, if someone deletes a message in a group, the bot will re-send it so you can see what was deleted.
antidelete.forward_in_place: Deleted messages are replied in place.
antidelete.forward_hint: Use `{prefix}antidelete forward <jid>` or `{prefix}antidelete forward here` to forward elsewhere.
antidelete.forward_reply_in_place: Deleted messages will now be *replied in place*.
antidelete.forward_this_chat: Deleted messages will now be forwarded to *this chat*.
antidelete.forward_dm: Deleted messages will now be forwarded to *your DM*.
antidelete.forward_set: Deleted messages will now be forwarded to `{jid}`.

blacklist.warn_message: @{user}, your message was deleted for containing a blacklisted word.

warn.reset_all: All warnings reset for this group.
warn.not_admin: Limit reached but I'm not admin to {action}.

mute.no_muted: No users are muted in this group.

remind.no_reminders: No reminders set for this chat.
remind.provide_id: Please provide the reminder ID. Use `{prefix}remind list` to see IDs.
remind.no_message: Please provide a reminder message or reply to a message.
remind.usage:
üìù *Reminder Usage:*

`{prefix}remind 10m <msg>` - Remind in 10 minutes
`{prefix}remind 2h <msg>` - Remind in 2 hours
`{prefix}remind list` - List your reminders
`{prefix}remind cancel <id>` - Cancel a reminder

addcommand.exists: Command `{name}` already exists. Use `{prefix}delcommand {name}` to remove it first.
addcommand.load_failed: Failed to load the command after saving.
addcommand.help_desc: Send Python code that defines a Command class.
addcommand.no_command_class:
*No Command class found.*
Your code must define a class that inherits from `Command`.
addcommand.missing_name:
*Missing `name` attribute.*
Your Command class must have a `name` attribute.
addcommand.missing_execute:
*Missing `execute` method.*
Your Command class must have an `async def execute(self, ctx)` method.
addcommand.cannot_determine_name:
*Could not determine command name.*
Make sure `name` is a simple string like `name = "mycommand"`

sticker.reply_to_image: Reply to an image, video, or sticker to convert it.
sticker.image_only: Only images, short videos, and stickers can be converted.
sticker.convert_failed: Failed to convert media to sticker.
sticker.video_too_long: Video is too long. Maximum 6 seconds for animated stickers.

Usage: {prefix}save <name> [content]
notes.no_content: Please provide content or reply to a message/media.
notes.no_notes: No notes saved. Use {prefix}save <name> <content> to create one.

filter.no_filters: No filters set. Use {prefix}filter <trigger> <response> to create one.

config.title: Config Command
config.owner_is_you: You are now the bot owner.

config.autoread_enabled: Auto-read enabled. Messages will be marked as read.

*Self Mode:* {status}

When enabled, bot only responds to your own messages.

config.ai_no_key: API key not set. Set it first with: config ai key <key>
config.ai_unknown: Unknown AI command. Use `config ai` for help.

eval.async_usage:
Usage: aeval <code>

Example: aeval await bot.send(msg.chat_jid, 'Hello!')

echo.usage:

Usage: {prefix}echo <message>

info.title: Zero Ichi Bot
info.description: A WhatsApp bot built with Neonize.

roll.title: Dice Roll
roll.usage:
Format: `{prefix}roll [count]d[sides][+/-modifier]`

Examples:
{bullet} `{prefix}roll` {arrow} Roll 1d6
{bullet} `{prefix}roll d20` {arrow} Roll 1d20
{bullet} `{prefix}roll 2d6` {arrow} Roll 2d6
{bullet} `{prefix}roll 3d8+5` {arrow} Roll 3d8 and add 5

poll.title: Create a Poll
poll.usage:
Usage: `{prefix}poll "Question" "Option 1" "Option 2" ...`

Add `--multi` to allow multiple selections.

*Example:*
`{prefix}poll "Favorite color?" "Red" "Blue" "Green"`
`{prefix}poll "Pick foods" "Pizza" "Burger" --multi`
poll.need_options:
You need a question and at least 2 options.
Wrap each in quotes: `{prefix}poll "Question" "Opt 1" "Opt 2"`

rules.title: Group Rules
rules.no_rules:
No rules set for this group.

Admin can set rules with:
`{prefix}rules set <your rules here>`
rules.provide_text:
Provide the rules text.

Usage: `{prefix}rules set <your rules>`
rules.unknown_action:
Unknown action.

Usage:
{bullet} `{prefix}rules` - Show rules
{bullet} `{prefix}rules set <text>` - Set rules
{bullet} `{prefix}rules clear` - Clear rules

welcome.provide_text:
Please provide welcome text.

Usage: `{prefix}welcome set <message>`
welcome.unknown_action:
Unknown action.

Usage:
- `{prefix}welcome` - Show config
- `{prefix}welcome on` - Enable
- `{prefix}welcome off` - Disable
- `{prefix}welcome set <text>` - Set message

goodbye.unknown_action:

- `{prefix}goodbye on` - Enable
- `{prefix}goodbye off` - Disable
- `{prefix}goodbye set <text>` - Set message

toimg.convert_failed: Failed to convert sticker to image.

schedule.usage:
Usage: `{prefix}schedule <cron|every <interval>> <message>`

Examples:
`{prefix}schedule 0 8 * * * Good morning!` (Daily at 8am)
`{prefix}schedule every 1h Drink water!` (Every hour)
`{prefix}schedule list` - List tasks
`{prefix}schedule info <id>` - Task details
`{prefix}schedule cancel <id>` - Cancel task
`{prefix}schedule toggle <id>` - Enable/Disable task
schedule.no_tasks: No recurring tasks found for this chat.
schedule.not_found: Task `{id}` not found or not in this chat.
schedule.min_interval: Interval must be at least 1 minute.
schedule.no_message: Please provide a message or reply to a message/media.

broadcast.starting: Broadcasting to {count} groups... this might take a moment.

report.target_required: Reply to a message or mention a user. Example: `{prefix}report spam links`
report.forwarded_admins: Reported message has been forwarded to admins.
report.dm_usage: In DM, use: `{prefix}report info <id>`, `{prefix}report resolve <id>`, `{prefix}report dismiss <id>`, `{prefix}report warn <id>`, or `{prefix}report kick <id>`.
report.ambiguous_id: Report ID `{id}` matches multiple groups (`{count}`). Run the command inside the target group.
report.action_warned: User @{user} has been warned. Total warnings: {count}
report.action_kicked: User @{user} has been kicked from the group.
report.usage:
Usage:
- `{prefix}report <reason>` (reply/mention target)
- `{prefix}reports open`
- `{prefix}report info <id>`
- `{prefix}report resolve <id> [note]`
- `{prefix}report dismiss <id> [note]`
- `{prefix}report warn <id> [note]`
- `{prefix}report kick <id> [note]`

Digest status

Enabled: `{enabled}`
Period: `{period}`
Day: `{day}`
Time: `{time}`
digest.sent_now: Digest scheduled and will be sent shortly.
digest.usage: Usage: `{prefix}digest [status | now | off | on daily <HH:MM> | on weekly <day> <HH:MM>]`

automation.title: Automation Rules
automation.missing_trigger_value: Trigger value is required unless trigger type is `link`.
automation.warn_message: @{user}, your message triggered an automation warning.
automation.muted: @{user} has been muted by automation rule.

autodl.title: Auto-Download
autodl.caption: Auto download: {title}
autodl.status:
Auto-Download

Enabled: `{enabled}`
Mode: `{mode}`
Cooldown: `{cooldown}s`
Max links/message: `{maxlinks}`
autodl.album_range: Album size must be between 2 and 30.
autodl.photolimit_range: Photo max/link must be between 1 and 100.
autodl.usage: Usage: `{prefix}autodl [status | on | off | mode <auto|audio|video|photo> | cooldown <seconds> | maxlinks <count> | album <count> | photolimit <count>]`

callguard.title: Call Guard
callguard.status:
Call Guard

Enabled: `{enabled}`
Action: `{action}`
Delay: `{delay}s`
Notify caller: `{notify_caller}`
Notify owner: `{notify_owner}`
Whitelist entries: `{whitelist}`
callguard.delay_range: Delay must be between 0 and 60 seconds.
callguard.invalid_jid: Please provide a valid JID or number.
callguard.whitelist_exists: `{jid}` is already in call guard whitelist.
callguard.whitelist_not_found: `{jid}` is not in call guard whitelist.
callguard.usage: Usage: `{prefix}callguard [status | on | off | delay <seconds> | notify <on|off> | ownernotify <on|off> | whitelist <list|add|remove> [jid]]`
callguard.caller_notice: Calls are not accepted on this bot. You will be blocked for calling.

leave.not_group: Use this command in a group or provide a group JID.
leave.no_permission: Only group admins or the owner can use this command.
